entry.title: Billionaire Frank McCourt: 'Dodgy Cryptocurrencies and Silly NFTs' Have Spoiled Blockchain's Narrative
entry.summary: The billionaire real estate developer took to the stage at Web Summit to unveil a manifesto for a "better web."

entry.title: Blockchain.com Secures $110 Million in New Funding
entry.summary: The Series E raise includes participation from Coinbase Ventures and other firms.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: SEC Crows Over ‘Impactful’ Crypto Enforcement Actions in 2023
entry.summary: "The crypto markets have seen tremendous growth, but also rampant misconduct," says Gary Gensler.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: You Could Win Part of $1 Million Worth of Prizes Playing Fortnite—Here's How
entry.summary: Crypto gaming startup Unix Gaming is offering up prizes to Fortnite players this week, with Counter-Strike 2 and other games ahead.

entry.title: Mind-Reading AI Turns Thoughts Into Text, Gives ALS Patient His Voice Back
entry.summary: Using brainwave sensors and AI, Unbabel’s new Project Halo hears messages and generates silent replies. Just think about it and the machine does all the work.

entry.title: An NFT Rug Pull Scammer Has Finally Been Convicted, Faces Federal Prison
entry.summary: Aurelien Michel, creator of the Mutant Ape Planet NFT project, faces up to five years in federal prison after pleading guilty Tuesday to wire fraud charges.

entry.title: GROK Meme Coin Craters, Holders Blame Crypto Sleuth Who Blew the Whistle
entry.summary: Traders who bought a GROK meme coin trying to capitalize on Elon Musk's AI chatbot are angry a crypto sleuth flagged it as a likely scam.

entry.title: GPT-5 Is Officially on the OpenAI Roadmap Despite Prior Hesitation
entry.summary: After initial reluctance, new remarks show OpenAI is already laying the groundwork for GPT-5 mere days after turbocharging GPT-4.

entry.title: BlackRock XRP Trust Faker Referred to Delaware DOJ
entry.summary: The price of XRP boomed yesterday after someone filed false paperwork for a new crypto ETF. Now, the state DOJ is getting involved.

entry.title: EverQuest, Call of Duty Vets Unveil Metaverse Game Avalon
entry.summary: The Avalon metaverse game will feature interoperable blockchain assets and opportunities for players to earn from their creations.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Lag While DeFi Tokens dYdX and Maker See Gains
entry.summary: Major coins and tokens, including Solana, have cooled from their recent rallies.

entry.title: Square Enix-Backed Atlas Uses AI to Turn Text and Images Into Game Worlds
entry.summary: The generative AI startup Atlas emerges from stealth with $6 million in gaming and blockchain investments.

entry.title: Nvidia Created an AI to Better Understand COVID-19 and Accelerate Medical Discoveries
entry.summary: The new GenSLMs model can generate realistic and predictive SARS-CoV-2 genetic variants.

entry.title: AI 'Doesn't Replace Workers', Says Signal President Meredith Whitaker
entry.summary: AI provides pretext for companies to "degrade the working conditions" of employees who maintain their systems, Meredith Whitaker argued at Web Summit.

entry.title: Ethereum and Bitcoin Hold Steady, But Solana Gains as US Inflation Cools to 3.2%
entry.summary: Inflation has dropped significantly from a 40-year high last June, but it remains above the Fed’s target.

entry.title: Disney Reveals NFT Platform With Dapper Labs, Including Star Wars and Pixar
entry.summary: NBA Top Shot maker Dapper Labs is expanding beyond sports with digital Disney pins minted as NFTs on Flow.

entry.title: Reddit Moons Surge 130% as Community Admins Plot 'Plan Forward' for Token
entry.summary: Reddit admins are "renouncing the Moons contract," rendering the token fully decentralized, and burning some of the supply.

entry.title: Google Puts Scammers On Blast for Exploiting AI Hype
entry.summary: A lawsuit in California court aims to end malicious ads and malware distribution on Facebook.

entry.title: US Could Kill DeFi Unless IRS Changes Course on Tax Rules: Blockchain Association
entry.summary: The crypto lobbying group implored the IRS on Monday to relent on its definition of one word or risk destroying decentralized finance in America.

entry.title: New Nvidia Supercomputing Chips to ‘Fuel the Acceleration’ of AI
entry.summary: At its Supercomputing 2023 event, Nvidia unveiled upgraded chips and a supercomputer that can accelerate scientific research.

entry.summary: With the FDIC set to testify before the Senate tomorrow, some industry leaders are asking who stands to benefit from the controversy.

entry.summary: What a wild 30 minutes XRP holders just had.

entry.title: Mad Lads NFTs Hit All-Time High as Backpack Taps FTX Lawyer for Exchange Launch
entry.summary: Solana’s Mad Lads NFTs are ripping after Backpack reveals more of its exchange plans and opens up early signups.

entry.title: Margined Bitcoin and Ethereum Futures Launching on Cboe in January
entry.summary: Cboe Digital will become the first regulated exchange and clearinghouse to enable both spot and leveraged derivatives.

entry.summary: If Elon Musk groks an AI chatbot, the meme coins will come.

entry.title: Why So Many Crypto Games Are Switching Chains—Or Calling it Quits
entry.summary: Nearly 50 blockchain games were halted this year, but others are migrating. Game7's latest report shares which chains are most popular.

entry.title: Solana Rally Cools as Bitcoin and Ethereum Hold Steady and These Alts Surge
entry.summary: Solana was on a roll last week, but has now cooled its rally. A number of alts like Filecoin, Polygon, and Cosmos are booming, though.

entry.title: Former Polygon Labs President Ryan Wyatt Joins Ethereum Layer-2 Optimism
entry.summary: Ryan Wyatt, also the former YouTube Gaming head, will build a team to support adoption of the Ethereum scaling network.

entry.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Discount Shrinks as ETF Optimism Mounts
entry.summary: The GBTC discount has reached its lowest level since July 2021, as the crypto market is buoyed by the prospect of a spot Bitcoin ETF approval

entry.title: God Mode: 7 Incredible Video Game Speedruns You Have to See to Believe
entry.summary: From NES to virtual reality, amazing speedruns never cease to impress. Here are seven that you need to watch.

entry.title: Why WNBA Star Jewell Loyd Relies on Crypto—And Why Bitcoin and Ethereum Are Her 'Anchors'
entry.summary: A decade after buying her first Bitcoin, two-time WNBA champion Jewell Loyd shares why crypto is essential to her career and humanitarian efforts.

entry.title: Inside the Esports Industry's War for Survival
entry.summary: Decrypt's investigation reveals ongoing challenges in the young esports industry—including VC bubbles, layoffs, and ageism—and where it's going.

entry.title: Check Your Wallets: Your NFTs Might Not Be So Worthless Anymore
entry.summary: Prices are up, sales are rising, and traders are buzzing. Are NFTs back? Not fully, but there’s a potential comeback brewing.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Springtime for Degens?
entry.summary: Price bumps and news of potential ETF developments for Bitcoin and Ethereum this week led many to try to will the end of crypto winter into existence.

entry.title: Billionaire Bryan Johnson Has Burned $4 Million Chasing Youth and Virility
entry.summary: Kate Tolo, the first woman to commit to Johnson's "Blueprint," was drawn to its intersection with artificial intelligence.

entry.title: From Offended Bots to Occult Gurus, The 7 Best Custom GPTs People Have Created—So Far
entry.summary: OpenAI just launched custom GPTs, and you can say goodbye to boring assistants.

entry.title: How to AI: How To Create Your First GPT
entry.summary: ChatGPT Plus subscribers can now build their own version of the powerful chatbot using simple prompts.

entry.title: Can’t AI Take a Joke? Elon Musk and Sam Altman Trade Testy Tweets
entry.summary: The tech moguls exchanged AI-themed insults about their rival chatbots, with Altman saying Grok has “cringy boomer humor.”

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Hits 18-Month High, Solana’s Market Cap Closes in on USDC
entry.summary: Bitcoin’s rally continued and a number of other alts experienced powerful gains this week—for a number of reasons.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.

entry.title: Amanda Cassatt on Web3 Marketing and the early days of Ethereum
entry.summary:
In this week's episode, our host is joined by Amanda Cassatt!
Amanda is the founder of Serotonin, a web3 marketing agency, the author of the first book ever published on web3 marketing, and led the marketing team that helped bring Ethereum to market.

entry.title: Midnight Society's Rob Bowling on Deadrop's New Cars and User-Generated Modes
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.

entry.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes
entry.summary: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.

entry.title: Art Blocks Marfa Weekend Recap
entry.summary: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.

entry.title: Phantom Galaxies: A Look Inside the Mech Shooter NFT Game
entry.summary: Animoca Brands and game studio Blowfish are developing Phantom Galaxies, an upcoming sci-fi mech shooter game inspired by mech battlers like Transformers. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks Blowfish Studios Cofounder and Managing Director Ben Lee about what it's like to play the game.

entry.summary: A clip showcasing how DeepMedia's DeepID deepfake detection tool works. Courtesy: DeepMedia

entry.summary: A trailer for the AI World Fair event in metaverse game Decentraland, taking place from October 25-27. Courtesy: Decentraland.
